issue.title: Lots of URDF parsing warnings when using sdformat

message.raw:
As of sdformat 1.4.5, gazebo 1.9.0, and drcsim 2.7.0, launching `atlas_utils/vrc_task_1.launch` gives only these familiar parser warnings:

~~~
Warning [parser.cc:353] No <sdf> element in file[/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands/atlas_sandia_hands.urdf]
Warning [parser_urdf.cc:2008] urdf2sdf: link[left_palm_left_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, parent joint [left_palm_left_camera_optical_frame_joint] ignored
.Warning [parser_urdf.cc:2013] urdf2sdf: link[left_palm_left_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, not modeled in sdf
Warning [parser_urdf.cc:2008] urdf2sdf: link[left_palm_right_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, parent joint [left_palm_right_camera_optical_frame_joint] ignored
.Warning [parser_urdf.cc:2013] urdf2sdf: link[left_palm_right_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, not modeled in sdf
Warning [parser_urdf.cc:2008] urdf2sdf: link[left_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, parent joint [left_camera_optical_frame_joint] ignored
.Warning [parser_urdf.cc:2013] urdf2sdf: link[left_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, not modeled in sdf
Warning [parser_urdf.cc:2008] urdf2sdf: link[right_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, parent joint [right_camera_optical_frame_joint] ignored
.Warning [parser_urdf.cc:2013] urdf2sdf: link[right_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, not modeled in sdf
Warning [parser_urdf.cc:2008] urdf2sdf: link[right_palm_left_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, parent joint [right_palm_left_camera_optical_frame_joint] ignored
.Warning [parser_urdf.cc:2013] urdf2sdf: link[right_palm_left_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, not modeled in sdf
Warning [parser_urdf.cc:2008] urdf2sdf: link[right_palm_right_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, parent joint [right_palm_right_camera_optical_frame_joint] ignored
.Warning [parser_urdf.cc:2013] urdf2sdf: link[right_palm_right_camera_optical_frame] has no inertia, not modeled in sdf
Warning [parser.cc:265] parse from urdf file [/usr/share/drcsim-2.7/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_sandia_hands/atlas_sandia_hands.urdf].
~~~

On the assumption that those will be converted to log messages once [sdformat issue #8](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/issue/8/) is addressed, we can close this issue.
